network

Class Networker

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.Networker

  • public final class Networker
extends java.lang.Object
    FULLY DOCUMENTED. UNSTABLE. This class is primarily responsible for interpreting all received telemetry/event message packets and handling each accordingly. This class has methods that are at high-risk of failure in past/future cFE Apps.
    Author:
    Joe Benassi, David McComas

    • Constructor Detail

      • Networker

        public Networker()

    • Method Detail

      • addApp

        public static void addApp(App app)
        If this App has a telemetry msgid unique from those of all other Apps in "apps", it is added to "apps".
        Parameters:
        app - The App to attempt to add.

      • addConfig

        public static void addConfig(java.lang.String name,
             java.lang.String msgid)
        Adds a Config to "configs" based on the input name and msgid. When this msgid is parsed from a telemetry packet, the telemetry packet will be parsed as an event message and the name of this config will display in the Event Window.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to display in the Event Window.
        msgid - The msgid, in String form, of this config.

      • getAppName

        public static final java.lang.String getAppName(Cmd cmdPkt)
        Returns the menuname of the App whose commandID matches that of the input cmdPkt. If no App has this, this returns "".
        Parameters:
        cmdPkt - An App's command.
        Returns:
        The String representing the menuname of the App.

      • restart

        public static void restart()
        Completes all the necessary steps for Networker to restart after File > Restart.

      • enableTelemetry

        public static final void enableTelemetry(boolean wireless)
        UNSTABLE. Attempts to enable telemetry. For all apps whose names start with "TO", their 6th command is sent with a String parameter equaling the either local or wireless ip address of this machine. Note: You cannot enable both local and wireless telemetry at the same time, because the CFS can only send messages to one IP address.
        Parameters:
        wireless - If the wireless IP for this machine should receive telemetry packets. TODO find a better, less dirty method to accomplish this.

      • enableEventMessages

        public static void enableEventMessages()
        UNSTABLE. Attempts to enable event messages. For all apps whose names start with "TO", their 7th command is sent with the no string parameters. TODO find a better, less dirty method to accomplish this.

      • printEvent

        private static final void printEvent(java.lang.String config,
              CcsdsTlmPkt pkt)
        UNSTABLE. Prints an event message in the main page based on the input config and CcsdsTlmPkt. This algorithm is hardcoded and likely to fail in other CFS/cFE releases.
        Parameters:
        config - The config to display in the Event Window.
        pkt - The CcsdsTlmPkt to parse for event information. TODO FIXME Hardcoded parsing!

      • monitorTelemetry

        public static final void monitorTelemetry()
        Monitors telemetry and event messages every 40ms. Determines if packets are telemetry or event messages, and handles them accordingly. Always receives all packets received by PktReader.
